response.raw:
Here is my attempt at the task, following the specified output format:

Supporting Training Material and Technical Manual Development

1. Gather Requirements - Meet with subject matter experts to understand training and documentation needs - Identify target audience and required content - Determine appropriate formats (presentations, videos, written guides, etc.) 2. Create Content Outlines - Break content into logical sections and subsections - Organize information in a clear flow from basic to advanced topics - Get outlines approved by stakeholders before full content development 3. Develop Content - Write clear, concise content explanations and instructions - Create supporting graphics, diagrams, screenshots as needed - Ensure consistent style, voice and terminology throughout 4. Review and Revise - Circulate drafts to subject matter experts and sample audience members - Gather feedback and make improvements to clarity, accuracy and completeness - Perform thorough self-review and copyediting before considering content final 5. Publish and Distribute - Package content into professional quality deliverables - Publish through appropriate channels (learning management system, intranet, etc.) - Inform target audience of availability and provide access 6. Maintain and Update - Collect ongoing user feedback - Make updates as products or processes change - Improve content over time based on actual usage and learning outcomes

Supporting Training Material and Technical Manual Development

1. Gather Requirements - Meet with subject matter experts to understand training and documentation needs - Identify target audience and required content - Determine appropriate formats (presentations, videos, written guides, etc.) 2. Create Content Outlines - Break content into logical sections and subsections - Organize information in a clear flow from basic to advanced topics - Get outlines approved by stakeholders before full content development 3. Develop Content - Write clear, concise content explanations and instructions - Create supporting graphics, diagrams, screenshots as needed - Ensure consistent style, voice and terminology throughout 4. Review and Revise - Circulate drafts to subject matter experts and sample audience members - Gather feedback and make improvements to clarity, accuracy and completeness - Perform thorough self-review and copyediting before considering content final 5. Publish and Distribute - Package content into professional quality deliverables - Publish through appropriate channels (learning management system, intranet, etc.) - Inform target audience of availability and provide access 6. Maintain and Update - Collect ongoing user feedback - Make updates as products or processes change - Improve content over time based on actual usage and learning outcomes
